solution_line_template: {students_liking_donuts} students want to eat donuts because {total_students} x {liking_donuts_percent} = <<{total_students}*{liking_donuts_percent}={students_liking_donuts}>>{students_liking_donuts}

They can each eat {donuts_per_liking_student} donuts because {total_donuts} / {students_liking_donuts} = <<{total_donuts}/{students_liking_donuts}={donuts_per_liking_student}>>{donuts_per_liking_student}
